import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Add Open ID Connect Settings</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/api/v31.02/settings/oidc"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"authConfiguration","saas":false,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Configures the OpenID Connect settings.

For more information, see [OIDC](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/prisma/prisma-cloud/30/prisma-cloud-compute-edition-admin/authentication/oidc).

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  -d '{"enabled": true,"clientID":"0oajdm6atavfYyJfr4x6","clientSecret":{"encrypted":"rnEk+1be20FLv+BYnDX4s5/T0NOb49hkNkaZQtgiF7K2s65"},"groupScope":"groups","groupClaim":"groups","openIDIssuesURL":"https://ss-123456.okta.com","providerAlias":"oidc_okta_ss"}' \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/oidc"
```

## Request

<MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json-schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}>Body</h3></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"authURL"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"AuthURL specifies auth URL.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cert"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Cert is idp certificate.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"clientID"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ClientID is the client identifier issued to the client during the registration process.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>clientSecret</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Secret Stores the plain and encrypted version of a value. The plain version is not stored in a database

</div><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"encrypted"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies an encrypted value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"plain"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Specifies the plain text value of the secret.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></div></details></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"enabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Enabled indicates whether Auth settings are enabled.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"groupClaim"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"GroupClaim is the name of the group claim property.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"groupScope"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"GroupScope specifies name of group scope.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"openIDIssuesURL"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"OpenIDIssuesURL is the base URL for OpenID connect providers.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"openshiftBaseURL"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"OpenshiftBaseURL is openshift base URL.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"providerAlias"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"ProviderAlias is the provider alias used for display.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"providerName"} required={false} schemaName={"identity.ProviderName (string)"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`github,openshift`]"} schema={{"description":"ProviderName is the identity provider name","enum":[["github","openshift"]],"type":"string","title":"identity.ProviderName"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"tokenURL"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"TokenURL specifies token URL.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"userClaim"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"UserClaim is the name of the user claim property.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem></MimeTabs><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>
